title: Shifting One more account to LCU
body:
HI to whoever person from Riot sees this,
I have another account, its called **[REDACTED]**. Right now, im posting this from **[REDACTED]** account. 
On LCU, I have my **[REDACTED]** id as login. But is it possible for you guys to make my **[REDACTED]**, i.e. the account im posting from, viable on LCU? I would still like to keep testing LCU, but i interchange between my accounts quite frequently. Let me know about it.
Thanks
Im just too OP

replies.body:
We can't transfer LCU access between accounts, unfortunately. You can apply for the Alpha Client access on the other account and see if it gets in, but there's no way for us to speed the process up transfer your access.

Let me know if you have any questions.
